ygData.subject: magic wepons
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know of any magic weapons you can loot off some creature?  I have run in to some major problems.  For some reason I don t seem to have more than
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know of any magic weapons you can loot off some creature? I
have run in to some major problems. For some reason I don't seem to have
more than 10pp in the bank. I do have a complete set of leather armor that
isn't protecting me as well as it has been. Anyway, I need banded armor and
figure the best way to make cash is hunting in fire storm, but the earth
elemental I have to train back to the zone because I can't hurt them (oh, ya
the disease cloud spell really works well). Any thoughts or suggestions
would be helpful. Because the only option I see is to go back and kill about
400 fire beetles, which would really decimate the area in Neriak for the
lower level people (unless they turn frenzy on again). I don't want to do
this, but if I did I would purchase 5 more backpacks and then start hunting.
I did go up against a cutthroat yesterday and it about killed me (I will
admit it con even). I had about 20 hp left and yes I found harm touch was
resisted a bit, it only did 73pts damage against it (out of 140 it should
have done, which would have killed it). OH, I am using a FS 2h sword, and I
have kept my 1h slash skill up. So any type of weapon would work, I am
willing to work on blunt or puncture. (and I don't like hunting in e-comm
because of griffin KOS attitude)

Also, does anyone know someone selling small banded in Neriak/Freeport area
on the Tarew Marr server? And what are the prices?

Again, any thoughts, suggestions or ideas would be appreciated.

Tenin
